verses.text: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
Awake, psaltery and harp: I myselfwill awake early.
I will praise thee, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
For thy mercy isgreat above the heavens: and thy truth reachethunto the clouds.
Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;
That thy beloved may be delivered: save withthy right hand, and answer me.
God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
Gilead ismine; Manasseh ismine; Ephraim also isthe strength of mine head; Judah ismy lawgiver;
Moab ismy washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.
Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
Wiltnot thou, O God, whohast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
Give us help from trouble: for vain isthe help of man.
Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is thatshall tread down our enemies.
